name: Sonic Panic
storyline:
In the beginning there was chaos.
From chaos came time and space.
After failing to get the time stones and the chaos emeralds, Dr.Robotnik is after the space gems.
Using the space gems, Dr. Robotnik has set up teleporters all over the world in order to build his empire in a flash.
To do so, he has recruited Fang the Sniper, who is searching temples around the world for more of the Space Gems.
Sonic has the new Buzzsaw ability!
Press jump again while in the air to spin into a buzzsaw cutting enemies in half, stopping projectiles, and opening up secret paths.
